version_description:
- Cloud Save
- Leaderboards
- New quest to increase storage space
- Epic and legendary box key recipes
- Resurrection Orb recipe
- Added Experience bar
- Minimap freezing fix
- Various bug fixes

- Gloomy caverns
- The Fearsome Crypt
- Forgotten Cemetery
- Chaotic Point (new Arcane Dungeon)
- The Demon Skulls
- Level cap increased

- New level: Mystic Forest
- Localization updates
- Various Bugfixes

- Maze of the Damned
- Character dialogues
- Bugfixes

- Maze of the Damned
- Character dialogues
- Bugfixes

- Undead market (trade materials)
- NPC conversations and character dialogues added to the Diary panel
- Bugfixes

- New story levels
- New Pit levels
- Music, 12 tracks (you can turn it off in the settings)
- Achievements
- Moonstones, Ability runestones
- New Hellhand levels
- Localization fixes
- Bugfixes

- New chests at the story levels which contains gems.
- Easier access to the Red Statue in Cyclopes' Lair (new secret wall)
- Cyclops and Lizardmans drops forge materials
- Detection potion
- Maximum storage chest space increased to 200- Bugfixes
- Translation updates

- Free gems contests
- Winter Event is over
Bugfixes. Full changelog is available on Discord.

- Daily,weekly,monthly and lifetime achievements. You can us the tokens at Rath Highrock (Near the blacksmith)
- Bugfixes
- Full changelog on Discord
